predicate.note: Frames file for 'teeter' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 47.3. And yes, there is also 'totter'.

roleset.name: stand unsteadily

example.name: usually with LOC
example.text: But for an ailing savings-and-loan association -- teetering on insolvency -- it can lead to safety from imminent demise and to a future full of promise.

roleset.note: LOC should maybe be promoted to a real argument.
